name: Deer Calls & Sounds for Monster Whitetail Hunting
name_original: Deer Calls & Sounds for Monster Whitetail Hunting
description:
Deer Calls & Sounds for Monster Whitetail Hunting app provides you deer calls & sounds for deer hunting at your fingertips.

The deer sounds and deer calls are clear, crisp, lifelike and recorded from real whitetail deer.

17 Deer Calls & Sounds soundtracks included.

Simply connect the app to any Bluetooth speaker and you have an instant sound system (where legal).

FEATURES:
- 17 Deer Calls & Sounds
- Effective, realistic and clear deer calls and sounds audio
- Bluetooth compatible to sync to a Bluetooth speaker
- These deer sounds for whitetail deer hunting can play in the background of your phone allowing you to text, take pictures and surf the internet without disrupting deer calls
- Connect to your speaker system with audio cables or Bluetooth (cables not included)
- No more forgetting to grab your MP3 player or memory cards, you always have your phone with you
- Audio for Deer Calls & Sounds for Monster Whitetail Hunting at a fraction of the cost of purchasing multiple soundtracks and memory cards separately

Soundtracks included in “Deer Calls & Sounds for Monster Whitetail Hunting"

- Buck Grunt 1 – Deer Calls & Sounds
- Buck Grunt 2 – Deer Call for Deer Hunter
- Buck Grunt 3 – Deer Call & Sounds
- Deep Buck Grunts – Deer Calls Pro
- Multiple Grunts – Deer Calls & Sounds Lite
- Wheeze – Deer Calls & Sounds
- Extended Wheeze - Deer Call for Deer Hunter
- Snort - Deer Call & Sounds
- Snort & Grunt 1 - Deer Calls Pro
- Snort & Grunt 2 - – Deer Calls & Sounds Lite
- Multiple Snorts - Deer Calls & Sounds
- Antler Rattle - Deer Call for Deer Hunter
- Doe Grunt - Deer Call & Sounds
- Doe Bleat - Deer Calls & Sounds
- Doe Distress 1 - Deer Calls & Sounds
- Doe Distress 2 – Deer Calls & Sounds Lite
- Lost Fawn - Deer Calls & Sounds

Download “Deer Calls & Sounds for Monster Whitetail Hunting" today!
